metadata.title: CVE-2016-10722 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: partclone.fat in Partclone before 0.2.88 is prone to a heap-based bufferoverflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the FATsuperblock, related to the mark_reserved_sectors function. An attacker maybe able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running theaffected application.

criterions.comment: partclone package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
